title: Custom Built-In Closet*, Resident lounge, Attached Garage(s)
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', "South Shore Boston's Premium Luxury Rental Community", 'Lenox Farms offers luxury Braintree apartments and townhomes, remarkable amenities, and a country club-style entry to welcome you home.', 'Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, these Braintree apartments boast granite slab countertops, stainless steel appliances, beautiful hardwood flooring, and in-home washer and dryer.', 'Enjoy access to upscale resident amenities including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a resort-style pool with fountain, private garage with direct access, and premier services.', 'Just off of Route 3 and I-93, Lenox Farms is only minutes from South Boston.', 'Enjoy the quiet conservation lands without being too far away from the best that Boston has to offer.', 'Shop your favorite stores at South Shore Plaza, jog the Blue Hills walking trails, take the Lenox Farms shuttle to the T, or escape to Cape Cod.', 'Lenox Farms is ideal for apartment living just outside of Boston- schedule a tour today.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Call Now:', '(781) 358-8966 x 6', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1330 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Custom Built-In Closet*', '- Attached Garage(s)', '- Microwave', '- Vaulted ceiling*', '- Fireplace*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Office Nook', '- Granite Countertops', '- Dishwasher', '- Nest Thermostat*', '- Washer and Dryer', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Air Conditioning', '- Premium Bathroom Finishes', '- Refrigerator', '- Walk-In Closet(s)', '- Ceiling Fans', '**Not all amenities available for every floor plan', '*Premium item', 'Community Amenities', '- Built-in desk', '- Recreation room', '- Hardwood floors', '- 24-hour package lockers', '- Closet built-ins', '- CoverPark', '- Swimming pool', '- Resident lounge', '- Smart home package', '- Availability24Hours', '- Washer and dryer', '- Den/ office', '- Granite countertops', '- Vaulted ceilings', '- Attached garage', '- Patio/ balcony', '- Furnished apartments available', '- Soaking tub', '- Clubhouse', '- Wood plank flooring', '- TVLounge', '- Business center', '- FreeWeights', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Built-in bookcase', '- Build credit score with RentTrack', '- Grilling area', '- Resident app', '- Fitness center', '- Fireplace', '- Pet Friendly', '- Dual vanity', '- Deposit free with Rhino', '- Playground', '- Walk-in closet', '- Controlled access', '- Tile floors in kitchen/bath', '- Moving services with Move Matcher', '- Tile backsplash', '- Short term leases available', '- Pantry', 'Pet Policy', 'Acceptable animals include domestic cats and dogs.', 'Dogs that are purebreds or mixes of the following breeds are prohibited: Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Chow-Chow, Doberman, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Pit Bull (American Staffordshire Terrier, American Pit Bull Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier), Rottweiler, Saint Bernard, Shar Pei, and Siberian Husky.', 'All other animals including exotic pets are prohibited.', 'ALL ANIMALS MUST BE AUTHORIZED BY MANAGEMENT.', 'Please contact on-site Management for further details.', 'Driving Directions', 'I-93 (or Rte. 128) to Rte.', '3 South, Take exit 17, Union Street, Enter roundabout and take the first exit on to Union Street, Take first left on to Ivory Street, and then next left on to Pearl Street, Drive straight through next roundabout in to community, Tour Parking: Future Resident Parking immediately in front of Leasing Office', 'Office Hours', 'Monday: 9:30AM-5:30PM', 'Tuesday: 10:00AM-5:30PM', 'Wednesday-Thursday: 9:30AM-5:30PM', 'Friday: 10:30AM-4:30PM', 'Sunday: 9:30AM-5:30PM', 'Lenox Farms', '550 Liberty Street, Braintree, MA, 02184', 're1J5YBhRrkc']
